Detailed Description

template<typename F>
class amop::detail::ReturnMatchBuilder< F, detail::EveryCallPolicy >

The builder object for EveryCall mode.

This template class defined the every call mode return object from MockObject::everyCall.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename F>
template<typename T>
ReturnMatchBuilder amop::detail::ReturnMatchBuilder< F, detail::EveryCallPolicy >::doing ( T  freeFunc  )  [inline]

Redirect the method to the given free function.

Redirect all call to the given free function, When you did that, all expectations you set will not affected.

Parameters:
freeFunc The given free function for redirecting
Returns:
The match builder of current method

template<typename F>
template<typename C, typename T>
ReturnMatchBuilder amop::detail::ReturnMatchBuilder< F, detail::EveryCallPolicy >::doing ( C *  pointer,
T  func 
) [inline]

Redirect the method to the given bounded function.

Redirect all call to the given bounded function, When you did that, all expectations you set will not affected.

Parameters:
pointer The object pointer of the function you want to bound
func The member function you want to redirect to
Returns:
The match builder of current method

ReturnMatchBuilder amop::detail::ReturnMatchBuilder< F, detail::EveryCallPolicy >::returning ( T  result  )  [inline]

Setting the return value of this method.

Set the return value when this method was called. The return value should be copyable.

template<typename F>
template<int I, class T>
ReturnMatchBuilder amop::detail::ReturnMatchBuilder< F, detail::EveryCallPolicy >::expectOne ( T  expect  )  [inline]

Set the single expect value by given its index.

Set the single expect value by given its index, for example:

                class Interface
                {
                public:
                    virtual void Foo(int a, int b) = 0;
                };
                
                mock.EveryCall(&Interface::Foo).expectOne<0>(100).expectOne<1>(200);

Then the expect value of Foo will be 100 for a, 200 for b.

Parameters:
expect The expect value
Returns:
The match builder of current method

template<typename F>
template<int I, class T>
ReturnMatchBuilder amop::detail::ReturnMatchBuilder< F, detail::EveryCallPolicy >::setOne ( T  result  )  [inline]

Set the incoming parameter by given its index.

Set the single incoming value by given its index, for example:

                class Interface
                {
                public:
                    virtual void Foo(int& a, int& b) = 0;
                };
                
                mock.EveryCall(&Interface::Foo).setOne<0>(100).setOne<1>(200);

                int test_a = 0;
                int test_b = 0;

                ((Interface*)mock)->Foo(test_a, test_b);

                CHECK(100, test_a);
                CHECK(200, test_b);

Parameters:
result The value to set
Returns:
The match builder of current method

template<typename F>
void amop::detail::ReturnMatchBuilder< F, detail::EveryCallPolicy >::count ( size_t  counter  )  [inline]

Set the expect call counter.

Parameters:
counter the number of call this method should be called
Returns:
The match builder of current method
